refnamediv.refpurpose: Use role attribute value for selecting which of several objects within a mediaobject to use.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If non-zero, the role attribute on imageobjects or other objects within a mediaobject container will be used to select which object will be used.
The order of selection when then parameter is non-zero is:

listitem.para: If the stylesheet parameter preferred.mediaobject.role has a value, then the object whose role equals that value is selected.
Else if an object's role attribute has a value of html for HTML processing or fo for FO output, then the first of such objects is selected.
Else the first suitable object is selected.

refsect1.para: If the value of use.role.for.mediaobject is zero, then role attributes are not considered and the first suitable object with or without a role value is used.
